name: Joy Ride
wikiSummary: From the 2008 album "Day and Age".  Taken from music blog "Pretty Much Amazing!":  "When asked “Which track on Day & Age do you think will resonate most with gay fans,” Killers front man, Brandon Flowers, said that the Killers “marry disco and rock in a perfect way on “Joy Ride.”” And I think he’s right. “Joy Ride,” track 4 on Day & Age, features a fantastically funky bass line and almost-misplaced organic hand-drumming."
wikiText:
From the 2008 album "Day and Age".
 
 Taken from music blog "Pretty Much Amazing!":
 
 "When asked “Which track on Day & Age do you think will resonate most with gay fans,” Killers front man, Brandon Flowers, said that the Killers “marry disco and rock in a perfect way on “Joy Ride.”” And I think he’s right. “Joy Ride,” track 4 on Day & Age, features a fantastically funky bass line and almost-misplaced organic hand-drumming."
